Name: Blimey
Ingredients: 20 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Serve with a cut-down paper straw.
Review: This vodka-laced " B lackberry and lime(y) summer cooler is both fruity and (hopefully) aptly named.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly in London, England.
Garnish: Fresh blackberry sat heroically atop crushed ice summit (it survived the muddler to reach its peak)
